of doing so, but it turns out a State Department cable exists in which Saddam Hussein thanked Donald Rumsfeld for the message. The letter must have come from the State Department itself, Donald Rumsfeld says. How could anyone believe that you couldn't remember if you delivered a letter from Ronald Reagan to Saddam Hussein ? he says. As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an adviser to Larry and Sergey Brin , Eric Schmidt said in the blog post. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
